I'm having an issue with connecting to the network on my gnome desktop.
Everytime i click "Wired Connection", and leave, then i come back and it's still disabled.
I'm in the screen under ubuntu>admin>network.
sudo ifconfig eht0 up, sudo dhclient eth0
and are all the lights solid
are they temp fixes or permanent?
well if you need to you could add the auto eth0, iface eth0 inet dhcp to your /etc/network/interfaces and possibly a pre-up /sbin/ifconfig eth0 up, post-up /sbin/dhclient eth0
you could also add the commands to startup applications
but i suspect it could have been the ISP dropping the connection, a reboot would give a definitive answer
so this will prolly fix it.
